root.Column-Info-Oracle: SELECT c.table_name AS TableName, c.column_name AS ColumnName, data_type AS data_type, data_length as length, data_scale AS decimaldigits, comments as Script, data_default as DefaultValue, nullable as isnullable, global_stats AS IsMarking, c.column_id as colid from cols c left join user_col_comments cc on c.table_name=cc.table_name and c.column_name = cc.column_name
root.Column-Info-SQL-2005: SELECT oj.Name AS TableName, cl.Name AS ColumnName, tp.Name AS ColumnType, tp.xtype AS ColumnTypeIndex, cl.length, cl.xscale AS decimaldigits, Script = CASE WHEN ep.[Value] IS Null THEN cl.Name ELSE ep.[Value] END, DefaultValue = CASE WHEN cm.text IS NULL THEN '' WHEN cm.text = '(getdate())' THEN '当前日期' ELSE cm.text END, cl.isnullable, cl.colstat AS IsMarking, cl.id, oj.id as colid, oj.type AS ObjectType FROM sys.syscolumns cl LEFT JOIN sys.sysobjects oj ON oj.id = cl.id LEFT JOIN sys.systypes tp ON cl.xtype = tp.xtype LEFT JOIN sys.syscomments cm ON cm.id=cl.cdefault LEFT JOIN sys.extended_properties ep ON ep.major_id = cl.id AND ep.minor_id = cl.colid WHERE (oj.type='U' OR oj.type='P' OR oj.type='V') AND tp.Name != 'sysname' ORDER BY oj.id, cl.colid
